subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: The "Forms Starter" package offers a pre-selected set of Lutece plugins focused on forms, providing the following features:

ul.li: Assignment of these forms to entities or administrators
Generation of PDF, CSV, and other files
All basic Lutece features (user management, permissions, roles, profiles, etc.)
